RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: 2-D E0 and Q map images of the north and south pole aurora from GUVI L1C N2 LBH radiance data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The GUVI data used here are provided through support from the NASA MOamp;DA program. The GUVI instrument was designed and built by The Aerospace Corporation and The Johns Hopkins University. The Principal Investigator is Dr. Andrew B. Christensen and the Chief Scientist and co-PI is Dr. Larry J. Paxton. See also Data Usage Policy at http://guvitimed.jhuapl.edu/home_guvi-datausage .

PublicationInfo.Authors: Christensen, Andrew B.; Paxton, Larry J.
PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory; Space Physics Data Facility

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Aurora Map (PNG) Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of PNG-formatted image files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then click the link for the desired file name.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Aurora Map Gallery
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows viewing of individual images or a slideshow of a sequence of images. To request data: select the year, day and orbit and the display type then click display.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI Data Products Access
AccessURL.Description: This web page provides access to data products as well as to descriptions and availability information.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Aurora Map (PostScript) Data Request
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows the request of PostScript-formatted image files for this product. To request data: select the year and day then click the link for the desired file name.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI POC L3 Aurora Map Gallery
AccessURL.Description: This web page allows viewing of individual images or a slideshow of a sequence of images. To request data: select the year, day and orbit and the display type then click display.

AccessURL.Name: GUVI Data Products Access
AccessURL.Description: This web page provides access to data products as well as to descriptions and availability information.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: FTP repository of TIMED GUVI L3 Aurora data in CDF format at CDAWeb

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the support from the CDAWeb team at GSFC/SPDF.

DisplayData.Caveats: The L1C files currently available are being evaluated. Please contact GUVI team before using

Parameter.Name: Magnetic north electron mean energy
Parameter.Description: Estimated magnetic north electron mean energy (E0)

Parameter.Name: Magnetic south electron mean energy
Parameter.Description: Estimated magnetic south electron mean energy (E0)

Parameter.Name: Magnetic north electron energy flux
Parameter.Description: Estimated magnetic north electron energy flux (Q)

Parameter.Name: Magnetic south electron energy flux
Parameter.Description: Estimated magnetic south electron energy flux (Q)
